patthana16.29:4.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.29:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke aṭṭha … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.29:5.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.29:5.4: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
